name: Custodial
description:
You've arrived fashionably late to your comfortable job as a custodian in a quiet facility for anomalous research.

You have mere minutes, again, before you and everyone else in the building are killed.

Custodial is a short RPG Maker horror-puzzle game that will typically take around 20-30 minutes total to complete, created for the horror game jam Screamortality! It's heavily recommended you take notes; you will not be able to complete it in one run. If you have trouble figuring out what to do, check out the "hints" txt file included in the game folder.
